name: Velvet Pouffe with Walnut Plinth - Paris Vienne
description: Introduce a playful piece to your interiors with this small and versatile velvet pouffe. The piece features luxurious fabric from the renowned fabric creator Misia Paris. The fabric is a cut and uncut velvet which could not be a better tribute to the Art Deco movement. Its finely ridged and textured warp enhances the geometric design, a procession of long, dotted satin lines. The Velvet Pouffe features a sustainable FSC-certified ash-veneered plinth which is hand-stained walnut. With its compact shape, the pouffe makes ideal extra seating for unexpected guests, a chic footrest or a side table for drinks trays.
